definition: to fight against/to oppose/to be opposed to/opposition
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: I seldom oppose Israel and Israeli teams these days.
sentences.chinese: 我很少反對以色列和以色列隊這幾天。
他對我的反對置之不理。

sentences.english: Instead, he fell victim to his faith in the anti-fat propaganda.
sentences.chinese: 很可惜，他成了“反對脂肪”宣傳的犧牲品。

sentences.english: The commercial is part of the government's new campaign against smoking.
sentences.chinese: 商業局是政府反對吸菸運動的一部分。

sentences.english: The main characteristic of Atwood's ecological thought lies in the anti-anthropocentrism.
sentences.chinese: 阿特伍德生態思想的主要特徵是反對人類中心主義。

sentences.english: Are there any points of resistance to this process of shifting people’s mindsets?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有對改變人們心態進程表示反對的意見呢？

sentences.english: It would be a complete mistake to decry love of power altogether as a motive.
sentences.chinese: 反對對權力的迷戀是人們的動機之一是個徹底的錯誤。

sentences.english: Again, I'm not opposed to long-term deficit reduction, so long as it's equitable.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，我不反對長期削減赤字，只要它的公平。

sentences.english: But his wife Cao Jingyun was opposed.
sentences.chinese: 但他的妻子曹靜雲卻反對這麼做。

sentences.english: Newton did not object to scientific postulation.
Opposition politicians blame the government, saying a river project has reduced farmland.
sentences.chinese: 反對黨的政治人物指責政府河川的計劃使得農地減少。

sentences.english: She noted down a number of objections in her note-book.
sentences.chinese: 她在本子上記下了好些反對理由。

sentences.english: Silent dissenters may not have yet dared voice their doubts.
sentences.chinese: 沉默的反對者可能不敢說出他們的疑問。

sentences.english: If you do not care about your love machine , used vegetable oil , such as points, I will not object.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不在乎你的愛機，用點菜油之類的我也不反對。

sentences.english: In Malaysia, officials have warned Muslims against celebrating.
sentences.chinese: 在馬拉西亞，官方已經警告過穆斯林要反對慶祝了。

definition: to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
to criticize/to find fault with/to denounce
